title: feat: account API improvements + authorize page restyle
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: The authorization page receives a sleek visual overhaul matching the dashboard theme, while the Account API now provides profile avatars and detailed balance breakdowns.
gist.impact: Users get a smoother, more consistent login experience, and developers can now access granular balance data and user avatars via the API.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot holding a shiny new pixelated ID card in front of a glowing green security gate. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'ACCESS'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
